resources.string: Your action will be performed now! Hurray!
Schedule an SMS to be sent when you are at a selected location
Remind to do something. E.g. Buy frappe, call Chandler, meet Joe
EEE MMM d HH:mm:ss z yyyy
Please note that the app needs location permission to work.\n\nSelect ALLOW in the next step to proceed.
Please note that the SMS reminder feature needs the SMS permission. If you deny it the feature won\'t work. \n\nSelect ALLOW in the next step to proceed.
